de.affect.compute

Class MoodEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.affect.compute.MoodEngine

  • public class MoodEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    The MoodEngine class is used to compute the current mood of a character based on it's personality and current active emotions.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Patrick Gebhard

      Mood compute(Mood currentMood, EmotionVector emotions)
      compute computes the new current mood based on the actual current mood and the active emotion(s) of a character.

      • compute

        public Mood compute(Mood currentMood,
           EmotionVector emotions)
        compute computes the new current mood based on the actual current mood and the active emotion(s) of a character.
        Parameters:
        currentMood - the current mood that will be checked if it is at the emotion(s) center position.
        emotions - the active emotion(s) of a character
        Returns:
        Mood the new current mood
